overview: Dr. Khushalani is interested in research on angiogenesis in melanoma and the translation of findings into clinical therapeutics.
research_interests:
He is studying the economic impact of new melanoma drugs on healthcare (pharmacoeconomics) with an aim to devise strategies to reduce cost.
  *
associations: Melanoma & Skin Cancer Center of Excellence

education.institution: T.N. Medical College University of Bombay
KEM Hospital and Seth GS Medical Collage
